programme.title: The Antichrist [Italian-Language Version]
programme.desc: A paralyzed young woman becomes possessed by the Devil when a hypnosis session accidentally awakens memories of her past life as a witch.

programme.title: Wish Upon
programme.desc: A teenage girl discovers a box that carries magic powers and a deadly price for using them.

programme.title: Dead Ringers
programme.desc: Twin gynecologists take full advantage of the fact that nobody can tell them apart, until their relationship begins to deteriorate over a woman.

programme.title: Witchboard
programme.desc: A woman finds an interest in her friend Brandon's Ouija Board when he brings it by her party.

programme.title: Dr. Giggles
programme.desc: A madman who believes he's a doctor comes to the town where his crazy father was killed, and soon begins murdering people and becoming infatuated with a teenage girl who has a heart condition.

programme.title: Hammer House of Horror
programme.sub-title: Hammer House Of Horror: S1 E7 - The Silent Scream
programme.desc: An elderly pet shop owner, who is secretly a former Nazi concentration camp guard, is intent on continuing experiments on human victims.

programme.title: The Last Man On Earth
programme.desc: When a disease turns all of humanity into the living dead, the last man on earth becomes a reluctant vampire hunter.

programme.title: And Now The Screaming Starts!
programme.desc: A young bride to be becomes the victim of her fiance's family's curse.

programme.title: Demons of the Mind
programme.desc: A physician discovers that two children are being kept virtually imprisoned in their house by their father.

programme.title: Twins of Evil
programme.desc: A religious sect led by Gustav Weil hunts all women suspected of witchcraft, killing a number of innocent victims. Young Katy, Gustav's niece, will involve herself in a devilish cult, and become an instrument of Justice in the region.

programme.title: House on Haunted Hill (1959)
programme.desc: A millionaire offers $10,000 to five people who agree to be locked in a large, spooky, rented house overnight with him and his wife.

programme.sub-title: Hammer House Of Horror: S1 E7 - The Silent Scream
programme.desc: An elderly pet shop owner, who is secretly a former Nazi concentration camp guard, is intent on continuing experiments on human victims.

programme.title: MST3K: The Incredibly Strange Creatures Who Stopped Living And Became Mixed-Up Zombies
programme.desc: A couple of slackers stumble across a cult of monsters at a carnival and becomes a killing zombie.

programme.title: Hail to the Deadites
programme.desc: A documentary about the fans of the EVIL DEAD films and explores the classic franchise's undying and ever-growing popularity.
